meta.job_title: Director of Business Development - Higher Education

duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed assigned pipeline and profit objectives, lead new business initiatives, and processes within the higher education sector.
Partner closely with Sales Leadership to develop overall sales strategies within a targeted territory.
Create new university and college clients and implement sales processes.
Exercise creativity and independent judgment in developing and evaluating sales and marketing strategies.
Identify needs and develop customer-specific solutions, building relationships personally with prospective customers.
Influence and develop team members without formal authority, and build relationships with intermediaries to build pipeline of opportunities.
